revised_title: A Case Study of Unusual Colic and Abdominal Distension
tldr: Dr. Davies and Dr. Shaw investigate a case of unusual colic and abdominal distension in a patient. They find that the colon is mortified and rotten, with excrement leaking into the abdominal cavity. The obstruction is caused by a severe doubling of the colon, with the two surfaces adhering so firmly that they cannot be separated without tearing the exterior coat of the intestine.
